TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F Austin to Samuel M Williams, 04-09-1832

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin to Samuel M. Williams, Saltillo, April 9, 1832. Retail law passed over governor's opposition. Political conditions prevent relief to settlers in east Texas. Prudence and moderation, however, will bring relief in the end.

*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Samuel M. Williams, Saltillo, April 9, 1832. Retail law passed over governor's opposition. Political conditions prevent relief to settlers in east Texas. Prudence and moderation, however, will bring relief in the end.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"* *p* [From Williams Papers, Rosenberg Library, Galveston, Tex.]*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*Leona Vicario */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="04-09-1832">9 April 1832*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr Sir.*/p*
*p*I arrived here Sin Novedad, on the *date_mentioned n="04-05-1832">5 */date_mentioned*and took my seat on the *date_mentioned n="04-06-1832">6th*/date_mentioned*. Nothing has been done except the ley de comercio, which I presume you have seen. The *person_mentioned*Govr */person_mentioned*opposed it very violently and returned it, but the *person_mentioned*legislature */person_mentioned*approved it a second time, only three voted against it. *person_mentioned*Aguirre*/person_mentioned*, *person_mentioned*Fuentes*/person_mentioned*, and *person_mentioned*Figueroa*/person_mentioned*. It will do the *person_mentioned*colonies */person_mentioned*no material harm, for not many of them have ever retailed goods out of the *location_mentioned*colony*/location_mentioned*. In principle it is unconstitutional, but nothing need be said on that ground at present.*/p*
*p*The *person_mentioned*Governor */person_mentioned*is decidedly in favor of the *person_mentioned*colonists*/person_mentioned*, he will sustain them if they act prudently, and had it not been for this *person_mentioned*Santana*/person_mentioned* business he would have taken some measures relative to the Trinidad de la Libertad affair, but to notice it now would be adding fuel to the flame of discord that threatens the ruin of the *location_mentioned*confederation*/location_mentioned*. The opinion of many who are opposed to the *person_mentioned*ministers*/person_mentioned*, and of all who are opposed ton *person_mentioned*Santana */person_mentioned*is, I that his real object is *location_mentioned*centralismo*/location_mentioned*. The *person_mentioned*Ministers */person_mentioned*are suspected to have the same views. The real *person_mentioned*federalists*/person_mentioned* are therefore opposed to the *person_mentioned*ministers */person_mentioned*and support *person_mentioned*Santana */person_mentioned*so far as to insist on their removal, but there they will stop, and if *person_mentioned*Santana*/person_mentioned* still persists all *person_mentioned*parties */person_mentioned*will [be] united against him except his personal *person_mentioned*friends */person_mentioned*and he will fall. *person_mentioned*Tamaulipas */person_mentioned*is in great confusion. *person_mentioned*Santana */person_mentioned*is besieged in *location_mentioned*Vera Cruz*/location_mentioned*—all the rest of the *location_mentioned*nation */location_mentioned*is quiet.*/p*
*p*On my arrival here I found rumors in great abundance relative to *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*—that it had separated and declared independence etc. etc. The *person_mentioned*Govr */person_mentioned*did not believe anything of the kind, and I have fully satisfied him, on that subject, he is in favor of the memorial and will recommend it when it returns through the *person_mentioned*Chief of Department*/person_mentioned*— he thinks it will be granted if no imprudence is committed by the *person_mentioned*colonists*/person_mentioned*. There will be a change of *person_mentioned*ministers*/person_mentioned*, an express who arrived last night from *location_mentioned*Mexico*/location_mentioned*, I am told brought news that it had been finally determined to change all the *person_mentioned*ministers*/person_mentioned*. The Memorial will therefore reach *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*with the *person_mentioned*Govrs */person_mentioned* recommendation in the right time, just after the new *person_mentioned*cabinet */person_mentioned*is formed, and whilst reform is the order of the day. The object is a very important one, and it is best to bear almost any thing rather than jeapordise all by rashness and ill timed passion and imprudence. All the wild sayings and gabbling over cups and speeches etc at *location_mentioned*Brazoria */location_mentioned*have been circulated over this *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*with wonder full augmentations. The fact is that the great majority of the thinking and intelligent part of the *person_mentioned*people */person_mentioned*in the *location_mentioned*towns */location_mentioned*I passed through and in this place are in favor of the *person_mentioned*colonists */person_mentioned*but they fear the *person_mentioned*settlers */person_mentioned*will ruin themselves by their imprudence. If they are unjustly oppressed and can so make it appear the majority of the whole *location_mentioned*nation */location_mentioned*will be in their favor, but if the reverse of this is the case, and they fly into a fit of passion for slight causes the whole *location_mentioned*nation */location_mentioned*will be against them.*/p*
*p*The advice I have reed, from a high source is, as follows— " Harmonize as much as possible with the *person_mentioned*military*/person_mentioned*—give no cause for disgust—be calm and never shew any passion—never use threats or harsh language. The *person_mentioned*Alcalde */person_mentioned*or *person_mentioned*Ayuntamto*/person_mentioned*. ought to keep an exact and detailed account of all the oppressive acts of the *person_mentioned*military*/person_mentioned* or *person_mentioned*revenue officers*/person_mentioned* and report the same to the *person_mentioned*Chief of Department*/person_mentioned*. Any one who is illtreated by a *person_mentioned*military */person_mentioned*or *person_mentioned*revenue officer */person_mentioned*ought to exhibit proof of the same to the *person_mentioned*Alcalde */person_mentioned*who ought to report it immediately to the *person_mentioned*Chief of Department*/person_mentioned*. No violence must be used on any pretext—no imprudent talking etc."*/p*
*p*Better advice could not have been given and if properly followed will produce favourable results. Do try and impress this on everyone, and especially on those in *location_mentioned*Brazoria */location_mentioned*who are rather warmer than they ought to be, tho perhaps not much more so than rigid justice requires.*/p*
*p*Some *person_mentioned*men */person_mentioned*in the *location_mentioned*world */location_mentioned*hold the doctrine that it is degrading and corrupt to use policy in anything. Without saying whether I approve of this doctrine or not, I do say that there is no degradation in prudence and a well tempered and well timed moderation. The absolute freedom of speech that is used in the *location_mentioned*U. S. of the North*/location_mentioned* is unknown in this *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*and hence it is not properly understood, and for this reason just complaints when made in harsh language are construed into rebellion etc. etc. As a general rule all over the *location_mentioned*world */location_mentioned*Language and Acts, must be regulated in a great degree by circumstances and characters*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Genl Teran*/person_mentioned* has evidently been deceived very much by the arts and management of *person_mentioned*Fisher */person_mentioned*but he will soon be convinced of that, if he is not already, and all will end right.*/p*
*p*Some amendments to the colonization law are proposed—they are not very unfavourable—the quantity of land is proposed to be reduced to*location_mentioned* half a Sitio*/location_mentioned* for those who exhibit proof that they have at least 100 head of Ganado Mayor—those who have not that quantity are only to get one *location_mentioned*labor*/location_mentioned*—the price is proposed to be increased a little etc. I doubt whether anything will be done with it this session. The *person_mentioned*members */person_mentioned*do not harmonize amongst themselves. The prospect is good that nothing will be done by this *person_mentioned*Legislature */person_mentioned*except the retail law.*/p*
*p*I presume that *person_mentioned*Ugartachea */person_mentioned*is in *location_mentioned*Brazoria*/location_mentioned*—remember me to him— his sister *person_mentioned*Mrs. Ibarra*/person_mentioned* is in good health and all the *person_mentioned*family*/person_mentioned**/p*.
*p*The memorial to divide the *location_mentioned*municipality */location_mentioned*will be passed to the house tomorrow—there seems to be no objection to it— you can read this letter to whoever you think proper— remember me to *person_mentioned*Sarah*/person_mentioned*,*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Shew this to *person_mentioned*John Austin*/person_mentioned*—*/p*
*/div1*
